headline.main: VICHY SEEKS OWN WAY OF TOTALITARIANISM; Pucheu Emphasizes Catholicism in Post-War Role of France

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 30 -- Under the title of "Plans and Prospects of the New French State," the weekly newspaper Gringoire today publishes under the signature of the former rightist Deputy Philippe Henriot an interview with Pierre Pucheu, Minister of the Interior, that implies the State will be totalitarian and supported by a single party growing out of the War Veterans Legion.
abstract: Min P Pucheu int in Vichy Gringoire says France will be totalitarian
